text: Need Riley Evans for Red Rooster campaign. Budget around $3,254, looking for 2 x Instagram post, 1 x LinkedIn post, 1 x 90-second product demo, 2 x Press conference. 8 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025.
